antBrain
Class State

java.lang.Object
  antBrain.State
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class State
extends Object
implements Serializable

State holds an ant brain instruction and a list of its parameters.

Version:
1.0
Author:
pkew20 / 57116

Constructor Detail

State

public State(int stateNum,
             int[] genes)
      throws IllegalArgumentEvent
State constructor used by the Genetic Algorithm, gives increased efficiency.

Parameters:
stateNum - the number of this state
genes - the values of the command and its parameters for this State
Throws:
IllegalArgumentEvent - if any of the genes are outside their range

State

public State(int stateNum,
             String stateString)
      throws IllegalArgumentEvent
constructor used when reading in States from file.

Parameters:
stateNum - the number of this State
stateString - the String to be converted into a State object
Throws:
IllegalArgumentEvent - if the stateString is invalid
Method Detail

getValues

public static int[] getValues(int states)
                       throws IllegalArgumentEvent
getValues returns an array of maximum values for each gene

Parameters:
states - maximum stateNum for st1 and st2
Returns:
number of values for each part of a state
Throws:
IllegalArgumentEvent - if getValue fails

getValue

public static int getValue(int states,
                           int field)
                    throws IllegalArgumentEvent
getValue to get the limit for one of the fields of the State

Parameters:
states - number of states in the Brain
field - index of the field to find the limit of
Returns:
the limit for the field specified
Throws:
IllegalArgumentEvent - if field is less than 0 or greater than 9

getGenes

public int[] getGenes()
getGenes to get an encoding of the instructions in this State

Returns:
the values of all int fields, and the ordinal of all enum values returns -1 if int or enum is not in use by state e.g. when command == SENSE, turnDir returns -1, as sense does not have a turnDir
